Arrive in Hyderabad and check into your hotel: Treebo The Living Tree, Khairatabad .
Directions from Secunderabad Junction to hotel

Afternoon (2:30 PM - 4:00 PM): B.M. Birla Science Centre & Planetarium .

Located on Naubat Pahad (a hill), this is a great indoor option. Explore the science museum, dinosaurium, and catch a show at the planetarium. Its elevation makes it a safer choice during heavy rains.

Late Afternoon (4:00 PM - 5:00 PM): Birla Mandir .

Adjacent to the science center, this stunning white marble temple offers panoramic city views. The high location provides a dramatic vantage point to see the storm-laden skies over the city.

Evening (6:00 PM onwards): GVK One Mall .

A good way to spend the evening indoors. You can shop, watch a movie, or have dinner at the food court.
Important: Travel to Ramoji Film City might be affected by waterlogging. Check real-time traffic and book cabs in advance. Allow for extra travel time.
Part 1: Take the metro from Khairatabad station to LB Nagar station. View Metro Route
Part 2: From LB Nagar, take an Ola cab (2 x ₹600) to Ramoji Film City. View Cab Route

*9:30 AM – 6:30 PM:* Full day at Ramoji Film City .

Explore the world’s largest film studio complex. Here are some of the activities you can enjoy:

  • Studio Tour: A guided tour of diverse film sets, including the famous Bahubali set.
  • Ramoji Movie Magic: Get a behind-the-scenes look at filmmaking with experiences like the Action Theatre and Filmi Duniya.
  • Live Shows: Enjoy spectacular performances like the 'Spirit of Ramoji' and the 'Wild West Stunt Show'.
  • Sahas Adventure Land: For thrill-seekers, this park offers activities like zip-lining, bungee ejection, and paintball.
  • Fundustan (For Kids): A dedicated children's park with rides, a gaming arcade, and a horror house.
  • Thematic Gardens & Eco Tour: Explore beautiful gardens, a butterfly park, and an exotic bird park.

Timings: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM

Entry Fee: Starting from ₹1350 (Adults), ₹1150 (Children)

Lunch inside Ramoji Film City. Some options include:
  • Alampana: Authentic Hyderabadi Veg & Non-Veg Biryani.
  • Bahubali Darbar: Bahubali-themed restaurant with dishes like Amarendra Bahubali Biriyani.
  • Masala Mahal: Rajasthani-themed restaurant serving specialty chat food items and meals.
  • Super Star: Multi-cuisine buffet with vegetarian and non-vegetarian options.
  • Dil Se: Veg and Non-Veg combos in a romantic setting.
  • Chanakya: An exclusive Jain restaurant that serves a Jain Combo.
Part 1: Take an Ola cab (2 x ₹600) from Ramoji Film City to LB Nagar metro station. View Cab Route
Part 2: Take the metro from LB Nagar station to Khairatabad station. View Metro Route
Important: The Old City is prone to waterlogging. Check local traffic and weather advisories before heading out. Use a cab for transportation.

Morning (10:00 AM - 1:00 PM): Salar Jung Museum .

One of the world's largest one-man art collections. It's an excellent indoor activity for a rainy day, with vast collections to explore. Don't miss the Veiled Rebecca and the musical clock.

Afternoon (1:00 PM - 2:30 PM): Chowmahalla Palace .

The former seat of the Asaf Jahi dynasty. The grand halls and courtyards are mostly covered, making it a manageable visit in the rain.
Lunch (2:30 PM - 3:30 PM): Lunch at a restaurant in a less flood-prone area like Banjara Hills on the way back from the Old City.
Transfer to Secunderabad Railway Station via hotel (to pick up luggage)
Depart Hyderabad by Rajdhani Express (Train 22692) at 17:25, arriving Bengaluru (SBC) at 05:20.
